Html:
Hi All,

Can you please advice me how to add a storyboard style to particular View...

Thanks and Regards,

Sakthi

Hi Sakthi,

You can find the State-Based Navigation QuickStart useful to your purpose. You will also find an example of the use of StoryBoards in Prism in the Stock Trader Reference Implementation.

I hope you find this helpful.

Guido Leandro Maliandi
http://blogs.southworks.net/gmaliandi
